attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to petition the Prime Minister to do something about Canterbury Job seeker plus at Canterbury, i made 41 phone calls and each time the phone was answered "We are busy at present please call back" this was for a friend who has come over from Germany and is entitled to benefit, she has waited for over 6 weeks now and still no payment, our systems are absolutely disgusting and its about time something was done about it, i have contacted our local MP Adam Holloway and am still awaiting a response.
